trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanging"></xref> event, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosing"></xref> event, or <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleting"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: A kezelő mód a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanging"> </xref> esemény, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosing"> </xref> esemény, vagy <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleting"> </xref> az esemény a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: The method specified in the WebPartCancelEventHandler delegate is called when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanging> event, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosing> event, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleting> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: A WebPartCancelEventHandler delegált részben ismertetett módon lesz meghívva egy <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanging>esemény, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosing>esemény, vagy <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleting>egy esemény jelenik meg.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosing> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanging>

trans-unit.source: Page developers can provide custom handlers for Web Parts events by adding an `OnSelectedWebPartChanging` attribute, `OnWebPartClosing` attribute, or `OnWebPartDeleting` attribute to the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element in a page, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute.
trans-unit.target: Lap fejlesztők biztosíthat egyéni kezelők kijelzők események hozzáadásával egy `OnSelectedWebPartChanging` attribútum, `OnWebPartClosing` attribútum, vagy `OnWebPartDeleting` attribútumot a `<asp:webpartmanager>` elem egy lapon, és az egyéni metódusnév hozzárendelése a attribútum.

trans-unit.source: A custom handler can also be assigned programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Egy egyéni kezelő programozott módon is hozzárendelhetők.

trans-unit.source: For more information on programmatically assigning an event handler, see [NIB: How to: Connect Event Handler Methods to Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc).
trans-unit.target: Programozott módon hozzárendelésével eseménykezelő további információkért lásd: [NIB: Útmutató: csatlakozás esemény kezelő metódusok események](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc).
